title: Remove hero section background image

requirements.text: Remove the background image from the hero section in HeroSection.tsx, replacing it with a solid color or gradient background while preserving all other content and styling
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section no longer displays the cityscape background image
Hero section has an appropriate solid color or gradient background instead
All text, CTAs, and layout elements remain properly visible and styled
Section maintains its visual hierarchy and readability

constraints: Preserve all existing hero section content (text, buttons, layout)
Maintain responsive design and mobile compatibility
nonGoals: Changing hero section content or copy
Modifying other sections of the website
